attributes.action: Makeup, false nails, hair accessories should be allowed in school.
attributes.background: How many people do u see around school that are given punishments for accessorues and makeup. Why should students be given punishment for something that doesn't affect their learning in any way shape or form. School uniform policies take away enough expression so these things are the only option now

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the UK Government/Parliament are not responsible for the issue you raise. Your school would be responsible for deciding on dress codes. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
